properties.description: Warwickshire Libraries, offer a comfortable safe environment for everyone to use and our free services will help to keep some of your costs down. You don’t need to be a library member to visit – just pop in. Choose to spend time reading, studying, working and using free library WiFi; tackle a jigsaw, play a board game, become absorbed in mindfulness colouring or join in our free library events and activities for all ages to make friends or learn something new.
properties.title: Alcester Library and Information Centre

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 28th November 2023** Begins at 10 for drinks and cakes. At 12.30 we start to serve soup and a roll until 1.30. Everyone is welcome at any time between 10 and 2
properties.title: Alcester Methodist Church

properties.address: Church House, Warwickshire, Warwickshire B49 5AL B49 5AL
properties.description: Church House is a ground floor meeting room on Butter Street, Alcester. We offer a soup and bread lunch at 1pm each Wednesday, and are open for coffee/tea and other refreshments and snacks from 11.30am to 3pm. At 3 pm anyone is welcome to join us for a short reflective moment. Other churches and organisations in Alcester are offering opening times on different days of the week. See https://www.alcester-tc.gov.uk/health-and-wellbeing/health-and-wellbeing-information-page/ for details.
properties.title: Alcester St Nicholas Church Warm Welcome

properties.address: Elmley Castle Village Hall, Pershore, Worcestershire WR10 3HW
properties.description: Village Hall with one large hall, a small hall, a kitchen and toilet facilities. Also 2 small rooms, that could be developed into a more cosy environment

hours._text: Monday: 14:00 - 15:30 Monthly, Wednesday: 12:15 - 13:45 Monthly, Thursday: 09:30 - 11:30 Monthly

properties.title: Elmley Castle Village Hall

properties.description: Our library offers a large collection of books for adults and children, free WiFi and access to computers. We host regular activities for adults and children, many of which are free. Located in the town centre we are easily accessible by public transport. Public car parks nearby.
